spec_data.Name: ailurus
spec_data.Description:
Ailurus is a simple application installer and GNOME tweaker.

Features:
* Help users learn some Linux skills
* Install some nice applications
* Display basic hardware information
* Clean YUM cache
* Backup and recover YUM status
* Change GNOME settings
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:15:47 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A simple application installer and GNOME tweaker
